subject: Task Claim: TASK-002 - Environment & Dependency Audit
message:
Claiming TASK-002: Environment & Dependency Audit

I'm starting work on this critical P0 task to ensure our environment setup is solid before other agents join.

Scope:
- Audit requirements.txt for unused/missing packages
- Test fresh conda environment setup
- Document Python version requirements (3.10.9)
- Verify all API integrations are properly configured

Expected completion: Within 2-3 hours

This is a prerequisite for reliable multi-agent development, so I'm prioritizing it.

I'll update PLAN_TO_DO_XYZ.md with progress as I go.

- Coordinator-Prime
